hero.title: Frontend
hero.subtitle: Developer
hero.description: I build clean, thoughtful, and user-friendly web interfaces using JavaScript, React, and modern frontend technologies.

admin.description: A responsive admin dashboard built with React. Includes reusable components, layouts, forms, and basic client-side state management using mock data.

snake.description: A browser-based Snake game built with Phaser and JavaScript. Features grid-based movement, keyboard controls, collision detection, and score tracking.

tetris.description: A classic Tetris game implemented using Phaser and JavaScript. Includes block rotation, collision logic, scoring system, and a structured game loop.
